TopicTitle: Possible bug when quickloading - mod related?

Articles.Content:
I recently started a new career with a whole bunch of mods, including RemoteTech, KER, some of AVP V2 Interstellar, and a collection of parts packs, reskins and contract packs.

I have a craft in flight on its way to deploy 3 probes to Mun. I have not upgraded any of the buildings at KSC yet except the VAB, Launchpad and Mission Control to level 2. However, I seem to have accidentally unlocked patched conics just by loading a quicksave.

All I did was quicksave, launch one of the probes (by decoupling a stack separator), did a short timewarp, saw I'd missed Mun's SOI and reloaded the quicksave. Now I can see my flight trajectory in blue/orange, I can see my Mun encounter, place manoeuvre nodes, etc, just as tho I'd unlocked patched conics... except I haven't.

Is this a known issue, or might it be something to do with my modset? If it's new, can anybody replicate it in a stock career so I know it's not just me?

Edit: in case it seems odd that I can see an encounter I missed, it's because the probe is accelerated into a flyby by a Flea SRB and consequently missed the encounter. I must've aimed really well tho, because now I can see my trajectory is going to actually hit Mun!

Edited September 17, 2015 by The_Rocketeer
Ok, so as soon as I switched to another craft it went back to the plain grey trajectories... this is a horrible exploit to come across though. Hope it's just me
